content: I broke a finish test in this otherwise innocent PR, likely because I generalized docs#gt_iff_lt to has_lt. Should I care or simply remove the test, assuming what broke is some ematch nonsense?

Haha, I ran into the same thing earlier. I just decided the generalisation wasn't worth the fight... I'm hesitant to remove the test, although the test is already a bit dubious: this is test/finish4.lean, which is possible testing for broken behavior anyway.
Oh, do you mean you were generalizing gt_iff_lt too? :laughing:
